Nighlight/Elita/Windlord:
 
Nighlgiht nodded and with Elita in arms, she w=
alked toward an Empty Chamber. Windlord looked at the group and said "Now w=
hat? It seems that or Nighlight is a clavoyance or she shares a deep connec=
tion with Rodimus, but we arent close to solve this"
 



To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Fri, 19 Aug 2011 20:26:04 -0400=

Subject: Re: Maximals - Ark Medbay







Straight Shot nods to Windlord.
=


" I am a little wiped out actually.  I can shut down for a little while, =
but just for a short time.  I'll stay with Nightlight and Elita just in cas=
e."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 19, 2011, at 8:0=
4 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:




  


Windlord =
& Nightlight:
 
"Nighlight, what happened? what are you talking about?"said=
 winlord
 
"I had a nightmare while I was in CR"said the femme among sobs"B=
ones in flames.. the smell of death... Rodimus and Dark Rodimus in a battle=
 to death..."
 
Windlord frowned and looking at Straight shot said "You and=
 Elita need to rest... Go to your chambers and try to sleep a little... Str=
aight shot, i guess that you should stay with them, at least a while"
 
 

=


To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Fri, 19 Aug =
2011 19:55:51 -0400
Subject: Re: Maximals - Ark Medbay




Straight Shot wa=
ddles over to Nightlight and Elita and offers her support.  


" Whatever h=
appens, just want you both ta know that I'm here for ya.  No matter what ha=
ppens, if ya need someone ta talk to, I'm all ears."


Uproar, who is also =
in the med bay, sneezing up a storm, looks over to Straight Shot, with a bi=
t of a concerned look on his feline face.  He seems to show a little fear a=
round her.  


" Uh oh.  Um how'd that porcupine get in here?"


Straight S=
hot giggles.


" Its okay, it's just me, Straight Shot, I went through a ti=
ny change."


Between sneezes Uproar slowly sits up, watching her carefully=
.


" Sorry, no offense but porcupines kinda creep me out."


Straight Shot=
 nods.


" That's okay, none taken.  If I was on the receiving end like you=
, I'd be kind of unsure too.  The quills are barbed and sharp.  Hmmm, maybe=
 Rodimus wouldn't mess with me.  If you need a guard, I could swing it."


=

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 19, 2011, at 7:25 PM=
, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:




  



 Nightlight\=
 Windlord:
 
"Just like my nightmares... Just like my nightmares" said Nigh=
light  as if she was about to  lost her Sanity
 
Elita Huged tightly her mo=
m, while windlord arrived and moved close to the femme
 
 



To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Fri, 19 Aug 2011 18:06:40 -=
0400
Subject: Re: Maximals - Ark Medbay




Nightshift steps forward to vol=
unteer as a field tracker. Being a Ninja Bot he knew how to track a bot and=
 do it without being seen or heard.


" I got an idea, I could follow those=
 coordinates and get real close ta finalize his location."


Tucson clears =
his throat in a commanding manner.


" As soon as you find him, inform me, =
I need to know if we have to take drastic security measures.  I know he wil=
l try to lure Nightlight and Elita out of hiding and I am not about to let =
him get near them."


He holds a serious frown on his face.  Nothing would =
get past a steadfast guardian, especially one of his caliber.

Perpetually =
on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 19, 2011, at 5:35 PM, Super Cyclo=
nus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:




  
> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift gives Wi=
ng Caliber the device to view on screen. He crosses his
> fingers hoping th=
at it did what he intended it to do.
>
> " Let's hope we got someth'n . I w=
asn't too close when I deployed it but
> within range for it ta pick up Dar=
k Rodimus's IFF. Even if that over rated
> hot rod gets his tailpipes outa =
that mean phase of his, no way I'm gonna
> trust him anymore. I seriously h=
ope we can retrieve the Matrix and get it
> outa that backstabber before it=
's too late."

<NEW>

There is smile from WING CALIBER as he takes the devi=
ce and examines
it for a moment. Then with a nod he presses a few buttons a=
nd slides
it into the recieiving section of his computer console.

With a f=
ew deft movements he activates the final sequence of commands
and turns to =
look at the screen . . .

The screen is black, a single phrase bouncing alo=
ng the screen reading
'no signal'.

"Slag." LEO said out loud before he loo=
ked embarrased and glanced at
NIGHTLIGHT and ELITA. "I meant . . . aw nuts!=
 . . . What happened?"

WING SABER looked at the screen for a moment confus=
ion clearly on his
face. "The machine was clearly picking up something it h=
ad a
location." he stepped back to the console as he manipulated a few
othe=
r controls. "Let's see what it recorded."

The screen goes from being black=
 to a replay of the scene where DARK
RODIMUS was facing down SCOURGE, the S=
weeps, NIGHTSHIFT and STRAIGHT
SHOT. The screen got bigger as the minicam a=
pproached DARK RODIMUS, in
the corner were cordinates indicating where they=
 were at the time.

Then the screen went black, presumably where DARK RODIM=
US vanished
from sight and then the screen went black again.

"That didn't =
show us much." LEO said, clearly getting preturbed.

"Patience." WING CALIB=
ER said as he carefully reran the scene in slow
motion. He zipped back the =
point where DARK RODIMUS vanished and ran
it again slowly.

"Look!' WING CA=
LIBER said as he pointed at the corner of the screen
that showed coordinate=
s.

In the corner the cordinates changed. One moment they were showing the
=
cordinates of where the Dinosaurs had been and the stand off had
occured. T=
hen for a micro second they showed something else, and then
went blank.

"R=
ewind that." LEO said, his voice more interested this time.

The scene back=
ed up second by second until if finally showed the new
cordinate. "We GOT H=
IM!" LEO said as he smacked one fist into the
other.

"Not so fast." WING C=
ALIBER said. "We only have a partial cordinate.
But we can now get close."
=

(TAG)

Preston
